skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: first reformed edgerton
des: Listen to the latest sermons from First Reformed Church in Edgerton, Minnesota. If you miss a Sunday of worship the audio feed will be updated by noon on Monday.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
